content: त्रिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [त्रयाणां संघः कन्] {@--1@} Triple, three-fold. {@--2@} Forming a triad. {@--3@} Three per cent. {@--4@} Happening the third time. --कं {@--1@} A triad. {@--2@} A place where three roads meet. {@--3@} The lower part of the spine, the part about the hips; त्रिके स्थूलता <ls>Pt. 1. 190</ls>; कश्चिद्विवृत्तत्रिकभिन्नहारः <ls>R. 6. 16.</ls> {@--4@} The part between the shoulderblades. {@--5@} The three spices. --का {@--1@} A contrivance for raising water (like a wheel) over which passes the rope of the bucket. {@--2@} The cover of a well.
